title: IE Process Monitor log and crash dump (if any)
description: This action plan is used to troubleshoot any IE startup failure or crash issue, regardless of the web application it loads. If the IE crash issue only occurs when loading a specific website, you should refer to the [IE crash dump, Fiddler, Process Monitor log](https://edgedbg.com/recipe/ie-crash-fiddler-dump-procmon) to capture logs.
head: procmon
ie-wer-crash-dump
iedigest
main: Start IE and reproduce the issue. Proceed to the next step after issue being reproduced.
